title: Raspberry mojito doughnuts
description: An impressive sweet treat for parties: lime flavoured ring doughnuts filled with a raspberry and mint jam and finished with a rum glaze. For this recipe you will need a freestanding mixer with a dough hook attachment, a cook’s thermometer, a 3cm/1¼in plain cutter, a 9cm/3½in plain cutter and a blender.
ingredients: 875g/1lb 15oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
105g/3½oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
spray bottle filled with a little sunflower oil
2 limes, juice only (3 tbsp juice required)
